name: TankyTanks
description:
Playable only with a gamepad. 

Blast your friends and foes away in this artillery duel -esque local multiplayer! Playable up to 4 players.

CONTROLS:

- MOVE: Left Stick

- AIM: Right Stick

- TURRET PITCH: Left Trigger & Left Bumber

- SHOOT: Right Trigger

- AIM ASSIST: Press Right Stick

- CHANGE AMMO: D-Pad Left and Right

- ACTIVATE SHIELD: East Button ('B' for Xbox and 'O' for PS gamepad)

- TOGGLE CONTROL SCHEME: Press Left Stick (Switches to tank controls)

FAQ

Are the sounds broken? The game only contains gameplay and visual aspects. You're not going deaf, the game just lacks any sound effects.

Why is the color of my tank changing between rounds? When the game begins, Players are assigned to the tanks by the order which they press the join button. The join functionality was done the fast and easy way, and this is the side effect.
